forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Heavy rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 37F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
